description:
Welcome to Corel Draw X7 Training:

Corel Draw - a program to work with vector graphics. This program is very easy to learn. In this video course, I want to show how to draw flowers in Corel Draw.

What's Included in this course?

This course includes the step of drawing algorithms flowers. You will learn a lot of practical techniques of drawing in Corel Draw. You will see what is used a particular tool.

Why take this course?

In order to become a Graphic Designer, You must have to have practical skills. This course will help you achieve your goal.
title: How to draw flowers in Corel Draw
